pr_title: Provides more intuitive representation for arrays in GREL

timeline.message:
Provides more intuitive representation for arrays in GREL

Added test for same
closes #2040

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't this also test an Array that is empty, i.e []?  Instead of a String that is empty, ""?
Also, I am wondering about multi-dimensional arrays which is kinda the point of deepToString... If the array contains other arrays as elements, the string representation contains their contents and so on.  https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/arrays-deeptostring-in-java-with-example/
timeline.author: thadguidry
